pullRequest.body:
Remove unused commutativity hypothesis:

* Removes the requirement for the Semirings to be commutative in `LinearMap.ext_basis` and `LinearMap.sum_repr_mul_repr_mulâ‚›â‚—` in `LinearAlgebra/Basis/Bilinear`
* Remove the requirement for some Semirings to be commutative in `AuxToLinearMap`, `CommSemiring` and `CommRing` in `LinearAlgebra/Matrix/SesquilinearForm`
* In addition, the rings in `CommRing` can just be `Semiring`

No changes to the proofs are required.

It would also be possible to weaken commutativity from `Râ‚—` in `LinearMap.sum_repr_mul_repr_mul` to `[SMulCommClass Râ‚— Râ‚— Pâ‚—]` in order to make `sum_repr_mul_repr_mulâ‚›â‚—` and `sum_repr_mul_repr_mul` consistent, but I have not done that in this PR because there might be a performance impact (see https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/7538#pullrequestreview-1663000126).

---

Used in #9334

> It would also be possible to weaken commutativity from Râ‚— in LinearMap.sum_repr_mul_repr_mul to [SMulCommClass Râ‚— Râ‚— Pâ‚—] but I have not done that in this PR.

If you don't want to do this, can you add a comment to this effect?

maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by ericrbg.

> If you don't want to do this, can you add a comment to this effect?

Done.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/87aacdb5-d844-4cf4-ade4-22d3af8a848e) for commit ab9623c24b57528ce03f87a06fab13f6d12a8796.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/13a094e0-7abf-4eab-b186-37e5a37a1550/to/87aacdb5-d844-4cf4-ade4-22d3af8a848e) against commit 26ccd1e9cdd53bee750bb6fba6f40db23a7d88f5.

Pull request successfully merged into master.
